welcomeMessage.greeting: Welcome to STRIVE TECH! I'm Sai, your AI solutions consultant.
welcomeMessage.intro: I help businesses leverage AI to solve operational challenges and drive growth.
welcomeMessage.firstQuestion: What brings you here today? Are you exploring solutions for a specific challenge, or just curious about what's possible with AI?

questions: Tell me about AI solutions for my industry
We're curious about AI but don't know where to begin
How do other companies like ours use AI?
How long before we see ROI?

services.name: Predictive Analytics
services.description: Transform your data into actionable insights that drive better business decisions.

services.name: Computer Vision
services.description: Automate visual tasks with AI that sees and understands like humans do.

services.name: Natural Language AI
services.description: Understand and process human language to automate communication tasks.
